programme.title: Time capsule / Vremenska kapsula
programme.desc: The National Assembly of Serbia elected him for the king, and large European countries were recognized by the new ruler of Serbia. It was a time of large turning events in the history of the Serbian people. In the maternal scene from the political scene, Obrenović have been missing, and the new spirit and the new order in the political and social life of Serbia, Karadjordjevići and King Peter and the grandson of the Great Wagond Đorđe Petrović Karadjord. / godine Narodna skupština Srbije izabrala ga je za kralja, a velike evropske zemlje priznale su ga za novog vladara Srbije. Bilo je to vreme velikih prelomnih događaja u istoriji srpskog naroda. U Majskom prevratu sa političke scene zauvek su nestali Obrenovići, a novi duh i novi poredak u političkom i društvenom životu Srbije doneli su Karađorđevići i kralj Petar I, unuk velikog vožda Đorđa Petrovića Karađorđa.

programme.title: Musical conversations in SANU / Muzički razgovori u SANU
programme.desc: Music is never funny but often for the topic has funny events or characters, unexpected crafts and surprises that leaves us breathless. For curious, for lovers and chamber sound connoisseurs, Academician Isidora Žebeljan and Obuista Borislav Čičovac, devised a series of classical music concerts in the gallery of San. The intention is to discuss the familiar figures from culture, science and sports, jointly contemplates artistic and vanumetic topics, and in a different and expanding way. / Muzika nikad nije smešna ali često za temu ima smešne događaje ili karaktere, neočekivane obrte i iznenađenja čime nas ostavlja bez daha. Za radoznale, za ljubitelje i za poznavaoce kamernog zvuka, akademik Isidora Žebeljan i oboista Borislav Čičovačku osmislili su serijal koncerata klasične muzike u Galeriji SANU. Namera je da se razgovorima sa poznatim ličnostima iz kulture, nauke i sporta, zajednički razmišlja o umetničkim i vanumetničkim temama, a na drugačiji i širi način.

programme.title: Mateja Marinkovic and BGO Dušan Skovran / Mateja Marinković i BGO Dušan Skovran
programme.desc: Belgrade String Orchestra Dušan Skovran is our stream orchestra with the most international performances and tours. The values of this ensemble make high quality performing, virtuosity and personal commitment to each musician to a common sound. The orchestra has performed around the world, and the repertoire covers a period from early baroze to modern music, with a significant share of domestic authors and more than 70 compositions dedicated to this orchestra. Among the artists with whom the ensemble was cooperating with: Schlomo Mind, Nigel Kennedi, Irena Grafenauer, Sreten Krstić. Ksenija Janković, Lovro Pogorelic ... before the viewers is a concert that BGO Dušan Skovran had 2010. years with our Violinist world votes Mateja Marinković. / Beogradski gudački orkestar Dušan Skovran je naš gudački orkestar sa najviše međunarodnih nastupa i turneja. Vrednosti ovog ansambla čine visok kvalitet izvođenja, virtuoznost i lična posvećenost svakog muzičara zajedničkom zvuku. Orkestar je nastupao širom sveta, a repertoarski pokriva period od ranog baroka do savremene muzike, uz značajan udeo domaćih autora i više od 70 kompozicija posvećenih upravo ovom orkestru. Među umetnicima sa kojima je ansambl sarađivao su: Šlomo Minc, Najdžel Kenedi, Irena Grafenauer, Sreten Krstić. Ksenija Janković, Lovro Pogorelić... Pred gledaocima je koncert koji je BGO Dušan Skovran imao 2010. godine sa našim violinistom svetskog glasa Matejom Marinkovićem.

programme.title: The Serbs from the fifth continent / Srbi sa petog kontinenta
programme.desc: The Serb series from the fifth continent, which regulates Dragan Gavrilović from Melburn, is dedicated to our people who arrived on the banks of Australia, and settled in its different regions. / Serijal Srbi sa Petog kontinenta, koji uređuje Dragan Gavrilović iz Melburna, posvećen je našim ljudima koji su decenijama stizali na obale Australije, i nastanili se u njenim različitim regionima.

programme.title: Bardovi Teatra / Bardovi teatra
programme.desc: The versatile artist, in addition to acting, also dealt with costume design, music and directed. Along with the acting career, he was engaged in singing in the vocal-instrumental composition of the sunflower. / Svestrana umetnica, pored glume bavila se i kostimografijom, muzikom i režijom. Uporedo sa glumačkom karijerom bavila se pevanjem u vokalno-instrumentalnom sastavu Suncokret.
